g2r 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    g2r

    A ggplot2-inspired grammar of graphics for interactive visualisations via g2.

    Installation

    # install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/g2r")

    Synthax

    From ggplot2 to g2r:

    1. aes -> plan
    2. geom_* -> fig_*
    3. scale_* -> gauge_*

    Example

    It’s looks familiar to ggplot2.

    ggplot

    library(ggplot2)

iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(.~Species)

    g2r

    library(g2r)

iris %>%
  g2(plan(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) %>% 
  fig_point() %>%
  plane_wrap(planes(Species), type = "tree")
